meta.author: Ibrahim Tareq
meta.tagline: A basic text-based adventure game written in Javascript
meta.welcome: Welcome to Dork - A text based adventure game engine written in Javascript. The aim of the game is to find the exit gate and leave the maze.

room1.description: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. There is a small mailbox here. A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Dork!' lies by the door.
room1.contextualHelp: There might be something in the mailbox..

room2.description: You are near the fountain, in front of a huge mansion. There are old engravings on the walls here.

room3.description: You are standing in front of a large temple. On the wall is an ancient inscription, probably a prayer in a long-forgotten language.
room3.contextualHelp: Try heading South and see where that leads you.

room4.description: You have reached the entrance of the huge mansion. The door is locked and all the windows in the front are bolted.

room5.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. A speck of light is coming from the west.

room6.description: You are standing on the banks of a fast flowing river. Along the river are the White Cliffs which seem to form giant walls stretching from north to south along the shores of the river as it winds its way downstream.
room6.contextualHelp: You're one move away from winning.

room7.description: You are at the exit gates, you made it! Thanks for playing Dork üòÑüèÜ
